name: Flask of Crimson Tears
effect_description: Restores HP.

metadata.notes: - Automatically given to player - Replenished after resting at a site of grace

name: Flask of Cerulean Tears
effect_description: Restores FP.

metadata.notes: - Automatically given to player - Replenished after resting at a site of grace

name: Flask of Wondrous Physick
effect_description: Bestows various special effects, dependent on the specific mixture of Crystal Tears.

metadata.notes: - Found at Third Church of Marika - Replenished after resting at a site of grace

name: Rune Arc

name: Festering Bloody Finger
effect_description: Attempts invasion of other player's world. Made obsolete after obtaining Bloody Finger.

effect_description: Temporarily boosts Immunity. Lasts longer than traditional cured meat, but with reduced effectiveness.

effect_description: Throw at enemy to inflict damage.

effect_description: Throw at enemies to inflict damage and build up Poison.

name: Explosive Stone
effect_description: Explodes when thrown at enemies, inflicting Fire Damage.

effect_description: Explodes when thrown together, inflicting Fire Damage.

name: Large Glintstone Scrap
effect_description: Break gem and use FP to produce many magic bolts.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone

name: Heavy Meteorite Fragment

name: Gravity Stone Fan
effect_description: Uses FP to emit fan-shaped gravitational shockwave.

effect_description: Throw at enemies to cause buildup of Poison.

effect_description: Throw together to cause buildup of Poison.
